name: Guild Master Manager
description:
Explore the world Missions Monsters Dungeons Battles Magic Brave Demon lord Magic. Participate to help the adventurers within the guild. to help the adventurers roam the fantasy world. Exploration is an integral part of the game, allowing new dungeons, monsters, and territories to be discovered. and encounter unexpected events with the adventurers

Management of the Adventurer's Guild
-Create missions for adventurers, hunt monsters, explore the world, build dungeons Including the rewards that will be received after completing the mission.
-Buy everything the adventurer sells. Monster Fragments, Ore, Books, Weapons
-Summon heroes from other worlds to join the Adventurers Guild.
-Selling textbooks, fighting skills, and providing training facilities
-Research: Bring monster parts to research armor, weapons, potions
